special_text:
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
I, II – Up to one target creature or planeswalker you control becomes a 5/5 green Horror creature with indestructible until Jerrold’s Truest Form leaves the battlefield.
You gain 4 life.
III – Return target legendary card from your graveyard to your hand.
